plot: A young woman gives a handcuffed convict a bouquet of white roses, as a symbol of hope. Years later, he turns out to be her benefactor, and romance between them develops.
title: White Roses
plot_es: A young woman gives a handcuffed convict a bouquet of white roses, as a symbol of hope. Years later, he turns out to be her benefactor, and romance between them develops.
